verses.verse: וַנֵּ֣פֶן <S%H6437><s%> van-Ne-fen Then we turned וַנַּ֔עַל <S%H5927><s%> van-Na-'al, and went up דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech the way הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan; to Bashan וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came out עוֹג֩ <S%H5747><s%> 'Og and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- the king הַבָּשָׁ֨ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan לִקְרָאתֵ֜נוּ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Te-nu against ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all עַמּ֛וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo us he and all his people לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah to battle אֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <S%H154><s%> 'ed-Re-'i. at Edrei

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra unto me Fear אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki into בְיָדְךָ֞ <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-de-Cha into thy hand נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti him not for I will deliver אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo him and all his people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> ar-Tzo; and his land וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta and thou shalt do לּ֔וֹ lo, כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher who עָשִׂ֗יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta, unto him as thou didst לְסִיחֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> le-si-Chon unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <S%H2809><s%> be-chesh-Bon. at Heshbon

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten delivered יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh So the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֜ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God בְּיָדֵ֗נוּ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-nu, into our hands גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> gam also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ע֥וֹג <S%H5747><s%> og Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- also the king הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo; and all his people וַנַּכֵּ֕הוּ <S%H5221><s%> van-nak-Ke-hu and we smote עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> bil-Ti no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <S%H7604><s%> hish-'ir- him until none was left ל֖וֹ lo שָׂרִֽיד׃ <S%H8300><s%> sa-Rid. to him remaining

וַנִּלְכֹּ֤ד <S%H3920><s%> van-nil-Kod And we took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עָרָיו֙ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rav all his cities בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv, he לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah become קִרְיָ֔ה <S%H7151><s%> kir-Yah, there was not a city אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not לָקַ֖חְנוּ <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-nu which we took מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <S%H853><s%> me-'it-Tam; שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim not from them threescore עִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> 'ir cities כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> Che-vel all the region אַרְגֹּ֔ב <S%H709><s%> ar-Go, of Argob מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4467><s%> mam-Le-chet the kingdom ע֖וֹג <S%H5747><s%> og of Og בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> bab-ba-Shan. in Bashan

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these עָרִ֧ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim All these cities בְּצֻר֛וֹת <S%H1219><s%> be-tzu-Rot [were] fenced חוֹמָ֥ה <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mah walls גְבֹהָ֖ה <S%H1364><s%> ge-vo-Hah with high דְּלָתַ֣יִם <S%H1817><s%> de-la-Ta-yim gates וּבְרִ֑יחַ <S%H1280><s%> u-ve-Ri-ach; and bars לְבַ֛ד <S%H905><s%> le-Vad alone מֵעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> me-'a-Rei towns הַפְּרָזִ֖י <S%H6521><s%> hap-pe-ra-Zi beside unwalled הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> har-Beh many מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. a great

וַנַּחֲרֵ֣ם <S%H2763><s%> van-na-cha-Rem And we utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher them עָשִׂ֔ינוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-nu, them as we did לְסִיחֹ֖ן <S%H5511><s%> le-si-Chon unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> chesh-Bon; of Heshbon הַחֲרֵם֙ <S%H2763><s%> ha-cha-Rem utterly destroying כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of every עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir of every city מְתִ֔ם <S%H4962><s%> me-Tim, the men הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> han-na-Shim women וְהַטָּֽף׃ <S%H2945><s%> ve-hat-Taf. and children

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הַבְּהֵמָ֛ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah But all the cattle וּשְׁלַ֥ל <S%H7998><s%> u-she-Lal and the spoil הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim of the cities בַּזּ֥וֹנוּ <S%H962><s%> baz-Zo-nu we took for a prey לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַנִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> van-nik-Kach out בָּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et at that time הַהִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ha-hi-V he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land מִיַּ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad, of the hand שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei of the two מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei kings הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver that [was] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; Jordan מִנַּ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> min-Na-chal from the river אַרְנֹ֖ן <S%H769><s%> 'ar-Non of Arnon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har unto mount חֶרְמֽוֹן׃ <S%H2768><s%> cher-Mon. Hermon

צִידֹנִ֛ים <S%H6722><s%> tzi-do-Nim the Sidonians יִקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> yik-re-'U call לְחֶרְמ֖וֹן <S%H2768><s%> le-cher-Mon ([Which] Hermon שִׂרְיֹ֑ן <S%H8303><s%> sir-Yon; Sirion וְהָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ve-Ha-'e-mo-Ri, and the Amorites יִקְרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> yik-re-'u- call ל֖וֹ lo שְׂנִֽיר׃ <S%H8149><s%> se-Nir. Senir

כֹּ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> kol all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei All the cities הַמִּישֹׁ֗ר <S%H4334><s%> ham-mi-Shor, of the plain וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad and all Gilead וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan, and all Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far סַלְכָ֖ה <S%H5548><s%> sal-Chah unto Salchah וְאֶדְרֶ֑עִי <S%H154><s%> ve-'ed-Re-'i; and Edrei עָרֵ֛י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei cities מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4467><s%> mam-Le-chet of the kingdom ע֖וֹג <S%H5747><s%> og of Og בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> bab-ba-Shan. in Bashan

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> rak- but ע֞וֹג <S%H5747><s%> og For only Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הַבָּשָׁ֗ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan, of Bashan נִשְׁאַר֮ <S%H7604><s%> nish-'Ar remained מִיֶּ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> mi-Ye-ter of the remnant הָרְפָאִים֒ <S%H7497><s%> ha-re-fa-'Im of giants הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold עַרְשׂוֹ֙ <S%H6210><s%> ar-So behold his bedstead עֶ֣רֶשׂ <S%H6210><s%> 'E-res [was] a bedstead בַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> bar-Zel, of iron הֲלֹ֣ה <S%H3808><s%> ha-Loh [is] it not הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he בְּרַבַּ֖ת <S%H7237><s%> be-rab-Bat in Rabbath בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> am-Mon; of Ammon תֵּ֧שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> Te-sha' was nine אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits אָרְכָּ֗הּ <S%H753><s%> 'a-re-Kah, [was] the length וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-Ba' thereof and four אַמּ֛וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits רָחְבָּ֖הּ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bah the breadth בְּאַמַּת־ <S%H520><s%> be-'am-mat- of it after the cubit אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish. of a man

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz And this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot we יָרַ֖שְׁנוּ <S%H3423><s%> ya-Rash-nu [which] we possessed בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et at that time הַהִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv; he מֵעֲרֹעֵ֞ר <S%H6177><s%> me-'a-ro-'Er from Aroer אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is by נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal which [is] by the river אַרְנֹ֗ן <S%H769><s%> 'ar-Non, Arnon וַחֲצִ֤י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and half הַֽר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- mount הַגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad Gilead וְעָרָ֔יו <S%H5892><s%> ve-'a-Rav, and the cities נָתַ֕תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti thereof gave לָרֻֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <S%H7206><s%> la-ru-'u-ve-Ni I unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִֽי׃ <S%H1425><s%> ve-lag-ga-Di. and to the Gadites

וְיֶ֨תֶר <S%H3499><s%> ve-Ye-ter And the rest הַגִּלְעָ֤ד <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad of Gilead וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הַבָּשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan and all Bashan מַמְלֶ֣כֶת <S%H4467><s%> mam-Le-chet [being] the kingdom ע֔וֹג <S%H5747><s%> og, of Og נָתַ֕תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti gave לַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> la-cha-Tzi I unto the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> ham-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all חֶ֤בֶל <S%H2256><s%> Che-vel all the region הָֽאַרְגֹּב֙ <S%H709><s%> ha-'ar-Go of Argob לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan, with all Bashan הַה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu which יִקָּרֵ֖א <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-Re was called אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> re-fa-'Im. of giants

יָאִ֣יר <S%H2971><s%> ya-'Ir Jair בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh לָקַח֙ <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> Che-vel all the country אַרְגֹּ֔ב <S%H709><s%> ar-Go, of Argob עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul unto the coasts הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <S%H1651><s%> hag-ge-shu-Ri of Geshuri וְהַמַּֽעֲכָתִ֑י <S%H4602><s%> ve-ham-ma-'a-cha-Ti; and Maachathi וַיִּקְרָא֩ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and called אֹתָ֨ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- after שְׁמ֤וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo them after his own name אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבָּשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan Bashan חַוֹּ֣ת chav-Vot יָאִ֔יר <S%H2334><s%> ya-'Ir, Havvoth-jair עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this
וּלְמָכִ֖יר <S%H4353><s%> u-le-ma-Chir unto Machir נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti And I gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> hag-gil-'Ad. Gilead
